extendedInfo.description: Attention HARRISBURG, PA and LANCASTER, PA value seekers! A revolutionary mobile app is available exclusively for you- unbelievably fast, easy, FREE tool to SAVE YOU INSTANT CASH on the best of your world. Discover big cash savings at your fingertips. That smartphone in your pocket now means big savings in your pocket! Take advantage of the valuable offers on many of the best local restaurants â plus personal services, recreational activities, retail stores, and more! No fewer than 1000 of the best local businesses you already like â with INSTANT SAVINGS OFFERS, plus traditional, "% off" coupons + 50% OFF, limited-time deals! WITH NO CLIPPING OR PRINTING â EVER! Download the app now and discover all the INSTANT CASH SAVINGS waiting for you â while youâre on the go around town â with all offers conveniently organized according to what youâre looking for. Traveling or work out of town? This app is perfect since we offer savings in 29 states and over 750 cities with over 50,000 FREE COUPONS + 1000's of 50% OFF DEALS! You trust the restaurants and merchants we feature where you live, shop and play so you can trust the DOUBLETAKE OFFERS APP to recommend great places (with great deals + coupons) as you take a trip or travel to work. IT IS SO EASY! Just decide what youâre up for, tap on an offer. Then hand your smartphone to the cashier/server and, with a tap, YOU GET THE INSTANT CASH SAVINGS! It doesnât get any easier than this to zero in on what you want and save big with offers you wonât find anywhere else online! Here are a few great features: - SHOP AND BROWSE for deals + coupons with EZ category options - REDEEM with a quick tap + send to iPhone Passbook - VIEW details, directions + business hours - SHARE your favorites with Social Networking options - FOLLOW your favorite businesses by setting mobile alerts - ACCESS your account and login to connect to your deals + coupons - MANAGE your saved certificates - EXTEND your savings online with DoubleTakeOffers.com Just REMEMBER TO KEEP YOUR GPS TURNED ON so your app can lead you to the biggest savings the best LOCAL businesses have to offer. Let your smartphone become your go-to savings resource! COUPONS COUPON CLIPPER DOUBLETAKE DEALS GROUPON COUPON CABIN COUPONCABIN COUPONMOM MOMS RESTUARANTS FOOD SAVINGS DEALS OFFERS COUPONS COUPONCLIPPER

reviews.title: Cannot register app
reviews.comment: Keyboard will not come on when entering email address. This is the only app that does that. Previous version worked great. Wish I could go back.
reviews.author: Chris F

reviews.title: Might be cool if I could register
reviews.comment: Unable to complete my registration on Android 2.2.  Disappointment as I am very choosy with app.  Pleasse fix and let me know. At least make a way to register online.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: First of all the settings menu is not visible when you click it, so settings cant be changed.  As far as savings go, they definately are there in the app, but i bbelieve they have many that are outdated.  plus they are missing many if the offers that give you in the actual mailer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: We love this app. We\'ve saved money while eating out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rating must be good! Or else!!
reviews.comment: When you give a company a \"bad\" rating on this ap - it gets deleted! They only allow good reviews!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Excellent app!
reviews.author: Lauren Casper

reviews.title: Works!
reviews.comment: This app is sweet.  Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: There was no way for me to complete the registration. There was no button for me to press or anything else to be able to continue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: I had no issues with registration   The website is very well thought out   PERFECT 5/5*
reviews.author: Matthew Snell

reviews.title: It\'s cool..
reviews.comment: But I\'m in Alabama.. Which is not anywhere near Lancaster and Harrisburg,Pennsylvania.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notifications?
reviews.comment: No way to turn off automatic notifications, it randomly alerts me of some random deal I\'m not interested in. I have to stop what I\'m doing, pull out my phone just to see that I can save 50cents on a dozen wings. I like to have control of that stuff
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No coupons
reviews.comment: Even with 20 miles distance,  no coupons
reviews.author: Anthony Rocco

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very useful and awesome coupon app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must install App!
reviews.comment: Great app! Smooth navigation, user friendly, and great local savings!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!  Not your same old coupon app!
reviews.comment: This is a very hip app!  There has to be 100 local restaurants in here!  Best of all the coupons are all free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is GREAT
reviews.comment: I was amazed at all the restaurants on here and tried belvedere coupon today for lunch.  Perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.comment: Nothing at all in the Twin Cities of Minneapolis, MN & St. Paul.   For shame, for shame.  UNINSTALLED!
reviews.author: Dubbya S.

reviews.title: Notification Spam
reviews.comment: This app will deliver spam to your notification bar with no way to turn it off. You can turn all notifications off but then I don\'t get email notifications. Bad bad bad bad and shame on them. Un installed it after the first one came a few weeks after initial install.
reviews.author: Michael Shane

reviews.title: No way to stop notifications
reviews.comment: Very useful app, but i don\'t want a coupon app buzzing and popping in my pocket telling me about a great deal, while I\'m at work. No way to turn those off, no way I\'ll keep said app installed.
reviews.author: Sean McDermott

reviews.title: Coupons
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: A Google User
